attributes.action: explain to the taxpayer why it is believed by him and other members of the House of Commons that apologising to the House is appropriate punishment for fraud, such as that perpetrated (and confirmed as fraud by the government appointed investigators) by the recently resigned Home Secretary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my feeling that an apology to the taxpayer would be much more appropriate that any apology to her partners in crime who are continuing to operate their expenses regime without proper oversight.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
